description:
I am trying to run nova trunk with the oslo.messaging 1.7.0 in my lab. Apparently, the notifications no long are sent. 

After some investigation, here are the issues:

This line is trying to load the notifier driver:
https://github.com/openstack/nova/blob/master/nova/rpc.py#L65

Then this line here tries to load the drivers:
https://github.com/openstack/oslo.messaging/blob/1.7.0/oslo_messaging/notify/notifier.py#L132

And self._driver_names is a list containing 'nova.openstack.common.notifier.rpc_notifier'.

My understanding then is stevedore will enumerate through a list of endpoints within "oslo.messaging.notify.drivers", one of them being "nova.openstack.common.notifier.rpc_notifier - oslo.messaging.notify._impl_messaging:MessagingDriver". Then stevedore will attempt to load the latter class.  Unfortunately, only oslo_messaging.notify._impl_messaging exists, and therefore driving loading for notifier would fail.
title: notification broken with oslo.messaging 1.7.0

comments.content:
I am trying to run nova trunk with the oslo.messaging 1.7.0 in my lab. Apparently, the notifications no long are sent. 

After some investigation, here are the issues:

This line is trying to load the notifier driver:
https://github.com/openstack/nova/blob/master/nova/rpc.py#L65

Then this line here tries to load the drivers:
https://github.com/openstack/oslo.messaging/blob/1.7.0/oslo_messaging/notify/notifier.py#L132

And self._driver_names is a list containing 'nova.openstack.common.notifier.rpc_notifier'.

My understanding then is stevedore will enumerate through a list of endpoints within "oslo.messaging.notify.drivers", one of them being "nova.openstack.common.notifier.rpc_notifier - oslo.messaging.notify._impl_messaging:MessagingDriver". Then stevedore will attempt to load the latter class.  Unfortunately, only oslo_messaging.notify._impl_messaging exists, and therefore driving loading for notifier would fail.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~xchenum

comments.content:
Simon,

Where do you see nova.openstack.common.notifier.rpc_notifier? I can't find it in latest trunk of Nova (say in setup.cfg)

setup.cfg in oslo.messaging (trunk) does seem to have the right entries:
https://github.com/openstack/oslo.messaging/blob/master/setup.cfg#L50
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~dims-v

comments.content:
Davanum,

Where and how is the setup.cfg used?

"nova.openstack.common.notifier.rpc_notifier - oslo.messaging.notify._impl_messaging:MessagingDriver" is one of the endpoints stevedore discovered automatically by inspecting "oslo.messaging.notify.drivers".

-Simon
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~xchenum

comments.content: [Expired for OpenStack Compute (nova) because there has been no activity for 60 days.]
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~janitor
